item.title: Minimalist Template for Academic Presentations
item.description: This template produces minimalist academic presentations with LaTeX Beamer.

item.title: Minimalist Template for Academic Papers
item.description: This template produces minimalist academic papers with LaTeX.

item.title: LaTeX Commands to Typeset Math
item.description: This style file collects LaTeX commands to easily typeset mathematical expressions, and easily read them.

item.title: LaTeX Bibliography Style File
item.description: This style file formats academic bibliographies stored in BibTeX files and produced by LaTeX documents.
